ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Horse limits
ygData.msgSnippet: ... it is no problem... only the keys, maybe some summoned stuff is left on the corpse... everything else is looted. ... i think clerics don t need an item for
ygData.messageBody:
> I would never leave my corpse sitting that long...

it is no problem... only the keys, maybe some summoned
stuff is left on the corpse... everything else is looted.

> Cool. But I think I'll stay away from that zone.

i think clerics don't need an item for their epic
from there, but almost all isles have drops for
other classes epic's... and you need clerics for
a raid up there... :-)

if you have an experienced raid leader for PoS it
is really nice to go there.

there are also a few guides availible, for example
http://www.geocities.com/lordhong/sky.htm


- bilt

--
Biltilie Dwimmerlaik, lvl 57 gnome magician, Tarew Marr
